Name: Opal
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
1.25 ml Orange blossom water / Orange flower water
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Fresh, fragrant flavours of zesty orange and gin with a subtle floral note.
History: Thought to have originated in the 1920s, the Opal notably appears in in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Opal contains 188 calories
